00051     //  ======================  XMLObject  ==========================
00052 
00053     enum XML_RC  {
00054       XMLRC_Ok           = 0,
00055       XMLRC_NoFile       = 1,
00056       XMLRC_CantOpenFile = 2,
00057       XMLRC_NoTag        = 3,
00058       XMLRC_BrokenTag    = 4,
00059       XMLRC_UnclosedTag  = 5,
00060       XMLRC_RFormatError = 6,
00061       XMLRC_IFormatError = 7,
00062       XMLRC_OFormatError = 8
00063     };
00064 
00065     DefineClass(XMLObject);
00066     DefineStreamFunctions(XMLObject);
00067 
00068     class XMLObject : public io::Stream  {
00069 
00070       public :
00071 
00072         XMLObject ();
00073         XMLObject ( cpstr Tag );
00074         XMLObject ( cpstr Tag, cpstr Data );
00075         XMLObject ( cpstr Tag, realtype V, int length=11 );
00076         XMLObject ( cpstr Tag, int     iV, int length=0  );
00077         XMLObject ( cpstr Tag, bool    bV );

00079         XMLObject ( io::RPStream Object );

00083         void  AddAttribute ( cpstr name, cpstr      value          );
00084         void  AddAttribute ( cpstr name, const int  iV             );
00085         void  AddAttribute ( cpstr name, const bool bV             );
00086         void  SetData      ( cpstr Data                            );
00087         void  AddData      ( cpstr Data                            );
00088         void  SetData      ( const realtype V, const int length=11 );
00089         void  SetData      ( const int     iV, const int length=0  );

00091 
00092         int AddMMCIFCategory ( mmcif::PCategory mmCIFCat    );
00093         int AddMMCIFStruct   ( mmcif::PStruct   mmCIFStruct );
00094         int AddMMCIFLoop     ( mmcif::PLoop     mmCIFLoop   );
00095         int AddMMCIFData     ( mmcif::PData     mmCIFData   );
00096 
00097         inline pstr GetTag()  { return objTag; }
00098 
00099         //   Here and below the functions allow for "tag1>tag2>tag3>..."
00100         // as a composite multi-level tag, e.g. the above may stand for
00101         // <tag1><tag2><tag3>data</tag3></tag2></tag1>. NULL tag
00102         // corresponds to "this" object.
00103         //   objNo counts same-tag objects of the *highest* level used
00104         // (e.g. level tag3 for composite tag  tag1>tag2>tag3 ).
00105         //   GetData ( pstr& ... ) only copies a pointer to data.
00106         pstr   GetData ( cpstr Tag=NULL, int objNo=1 );
00107         XML_RC GetData ( pstr   & Data, cpstr Tag=NULL, int objNo=1 );
00108         XML_RC GetData ( realtype &  V, cpstr Tag=NULL, int objNo=1 );
00109         XML_RC GetData ( int      & iV, cpstr Tag=NULL, int objNo=1 );
00110         XML_RC GetData ( bool     & bV, cpstr Tag=NULL, int objNo=1 );
00111 
00112         PXMLObject GetObject     ( cpstr Tag, int objNo=1 );
00113         PXMLObject GetFirstObject();
00114         PXMLObject GetLastObject ();
00115         inline int GetNumberOfObjects() { return nObjects; }
00116         PXMLObject GetObject     ( int objectNo );  // 0,1,...
00117 
00118         inline PXMLObject GetParent() { return parent; }
00119 
00120         void   AddObject   ( PXMLObject XMLObject , int lenInc=10 );
00121         XML_RC WriteObject ( cpstr FName, int pos=0, int ident=2  );
00122         void   WriteObject ( io::RFile f, int pos=0, int ident=2  );
00123         XML_RC ReadObject  ( cpstr FName );
00124         XML_RC ReadObject  ( io::RFile f, pstr S, int & pos, int slen );
00125 
00126         virtual void Copy ( PXMLObject xmlObject );
00127 
00128         void  write ( io::RFile f );
00129         void  read  ( io::RFile f );
00130 
00131       protected:
00132         PXMLObject  parent;
00133         pstr        objTag;
00134         pstr        objData;
00135         int         nObjects,nAlloc;
00136         PPXMLObject object;
00137         int         nAttributes,nAttrAlloc;
00138         psvector    attr_name,attr_value;
00139 
00140         void         InitXMLObject();
00141         virtual void FreeMemory   ();
00142 
00143         inline void SetParent ( PXMLObject p ) { parent = p; }
00144 
00145     };
